Quote: You are not your illness.
Author: Julian Seifter

Quote: What mental health needs is more sunlight, more candor, and more unashamed conversation.
Author: Glenn Close

Quote: There is hope, even when your brain tells you there isn’t.
Author: John Green

Quote: Not until we are lost do we begin to understand ourselves.
Author: Henry David Thoreau

Quote: If you’re going through hell, keep going.
Author: Winston Churchill

Quote: Healing takes time, and asking for help is a courageous step.
Author: Mariska Hargitay

Quote: Sometimes the people around you won’t understand your journey. They don’t need to—it's not for them.
Author: Joubert Botha

Quote: You don’t have to control your thoughts; you just have to stop letting them control you.
Author: Dan Millman

Quote: Sometimes the most important thing in a whole day is the rest we take between two deep breaths.
Author: Etty Hillesum

Quote: There is a crack in everything, that’s how the light gets in.
Author: Leonard Cohen11
column3: Your present circumstances don’t determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.

Quote: Out of difficulties grow miracles.
Author: Jean de La Bruyère13
column3: You, yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.

Quote: Our greatest glory is not in never failing, but in rising every time we fall.
Author: Confucius

Quote: Courage doesn’t always roar.
Author: Mary Anne Radmacher

Quote: Give yourself the same care and attention you give to others.
Author: Sabrina Ward Harrison

Quote: Sometimes you have to be your own hero.
Author: Charles Bukowski

Quote: Emotional pain is not something that should be hidden away.
Author: Dalai Lama XIV

Quote: There is no standard normal. Normal is subjective.
Author: Maggie Smith

Quote: Nothing can dim the light that shines from within.
Author: Maya Angelou

Quote: Be gentle with yourself. You are doing the best you can.
Author: Paulo Coelho22
column3: Happiness can be found even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.

Quote: Rest is not idleness.
Author: John Lubbock

Quote: Self-care is not a waste of time; self-care makes your use of time more sustainable.
Author: Jack Kornfield

Quote: Just when the caterpillar thought the world was over, it became a butterfly.
Author: Barbara Haines Howett

Quote: Every day begins with an act of courage and hope: getting out of bed.
Author: Mason Cooley

Quote: Sometimes you don’t realize your own strength until you face your greatest weakness.
Author: Susan Gale

Quote: The greatest weapon against stress is our ability to choose one thought over another.
Author: William James

Quote: Even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise.
Author: Victor Hugo

Quote: You are allowed to be both a masterpiece and a work in progress at the same time.
Author: Sophia Bush

Quote: Feelings are much like waves; we can't stop them from coming, but we can choose which ones to surf.
Author: Jonatan Mårtensson

Quote: Quiet the mind, and the soul will speak.
Author: Ma Jaya Sati Bhagavati

Quote: Anxiety does not empty tomorrow of its sorrows, but only empties today of its strength.
Author: Charles Spurgeon

Quote: Your story isn’t over.
Author: Nina LaCour

Quote: Hope is a powerful thing. It gives you the strength to keep going when you feel like giving up.
Author: Jennifer Niven

Quote: You don’t find your worth in a job, a person, or a thing. You find it within yourself.
Author: Sheryl Crow

Quote: When I accept myself, I am freed from the burden of needing you to accept me.
Author: Steve Maraboli

Quote: Sometimes the bravest thing you can do is just keep going.
Author: Bear Grylls

Quote: Scars show us where we have been. They do not dictate where we are going.
Author: David Rossi

Quote: If you can’t fly, then run. If you can’t run, then walk. But whatever you do, keep moving forward.
Author: Martin Luther King Jr.

Quote: There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.
Author: Maya Angelou

Quote: Let your hopes, not your hurts, shape your future.
Author: Robert H. Schuller

Quote: Sometimes you just need to talk about something—not to get sympathy but to feel seen.
Author: Lori Gottlieb

Quote: You are stronger than you know.
Author: A.A. Milne

Quote: The only journey is the journey within.
Author: Rainer Maria Rilke

Quote: Worry never robs tomorrow of its sorrow; it only saps today of its joy.
Author: Leo Buscaglia

Quote: When we deny our stories, they define us. When we own our stories, we get to write the ending.
Author: Brené Brown

Quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
Author: Oprah Winfrey

Quote: Promise me you’ll always remember: You’re braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
Author: A.A. Milne

Quote: The best way out is always through.
Author: Robert Frost
